SEARCH
Package com.indus.training.persist.dao

Interface ICustomerDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerDaoImpl
public interface ICustomerDao
Interface for managing Customer data access operations. Provides methods to insert, fetch, delete, and update Customer records.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Boolean
    deleteCustomer(Integer customerId)
    Deletes a customer record from the database based on the customer ID.
    Customer
    fetchCustomer(Integer customerId)
    Fetches a customer record from the database based on the customer ID.
    List<Order>
    getAllOrdersByCustomerId(Integer customerId)
    Gets all the Orders of Given Customer Id
    Boolean
    insertCustomer(Customer customer)
    Inserts a customer object into the database.
    Boolean
    updateCustomerById(Integer customerId, Customer updatedCustomer)
    Updates the customer in the database.

  • Method Details

    • insertCustomer

      Boolean insertCustomer(Customer customer) throws CustomerDaoException
      Inserts a customer object into the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer object to insert
      Returns:
      true if the customer was inserted successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      CustomerDaoException - if an error occurs during the insertion process

    • fetchCustomer

      Customer fetchCustomer(Integer customerId) throws CustomerDaoException
      Fetches a customer record from the database based on the customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer to fetch
      Returns:
      the Customer object corresponding to the given customer ID, or null if not found
      Throws:
      CustomerDaoException - if an error occurs during the fetch operation

    • deleteCustomer

      Boolean deleteCustomer(Integer customerId) throws CustomerDaoException
      Deletes a customer record from the database based on the customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer to delete
      Returns:
      true if the customer was deleted successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      CustomerDaoException - if an error occurs during the deletion process

    • updateCustomerById

      Boolean updateCustomerById(Integer customerId, Customer updatedCustomer) throws CustomerDaoException
      Updates the customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer to be updated
      updatedCustomer - the updated customer object
      Returns:
      true if the customer was updated successfully, false otherwise
      Throws:
      CustomerDaoException - if an error occurs during the update process

    • getAllOrdersByCustomerId

      List<Order> getAllOrdersByCustomerId(Integer customerId) throws CustomerDaoException
      Gets all the Orders of Given Customer Id
      Parameters:
      customerId - the Id of Customer whose Orders need to be fetched
      Returns:
      the list of Orders
      Throws:
      CustomerDaoException - if an error occurs during the fetching process
